turns.model_response: Манхэттенское расстояние — это функция или метрика, которая определяетsimilarity or distance between two points вsome way, typically as the sum of Absolute differences of their coordinates. Imagine you have several points on a plane; to find the Manhattan distance between two points (x1,y1) and (x2,y2), you calculate |x2−x1| + |y2−y1|. This method adds up the absolute differences in each dimension, making it different from Euclidean distance, which uses the square root of the sum of squared differences.
